name: kube-credential
description: Kube Credential assignment with microservices architecture

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:services && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:services: cd services/issuance-service && npm install && cd ../verification-service && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run build:services && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:services: cd services/issuance-service && npm run build && cd ../verification-service && npm run build
scripts.test:services: cd services/issuance-service && npm test && cd ../verification-service && npm test
scripts.docker:build: docker build -t kube-credential/issuance-service ./services/issuance-service && docker build -t kube-credential/verification-service ./services/verification-service

author: Kube Credential Assignment
